metadata.title: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: Computer engineers work in all sectors - from AI to smart cities. Find out where to work, how much you earn and how Inteli trains leaders in the field.

content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: By Michele Bazana & Rafael Matsuyama
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: Have you ever wondered where acomputer engineercan work and what the financial return is for this career?
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: The answer is simple: in practically every sector. This professional can develop hardware and software solutions for industry, health, finance, telecommunications, agribusiness, energy, smart cities and even emerging areas such as generative AI, robotics and cloud computing.
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: Sectors of activity
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: According to theBrazilian Computer Society (SBC)and reports from theWorld Economic Forum, computer engineers are among the most in-demand professionals globally. In Brazil, there are opportunities in
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn
Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, our students experience these challenges from the first day of school, with real projects in partnership with companies from various sectors.
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: Salary ranges
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: According toGlassdoorand theCatho Guide:
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text:
According toGlassdoorand theCatho Guide:

- Junior Computer Engineer:R$ 5,000 - R$ 7,500/month.
- Full Computer Engineer:R$ 8,000 - R$ 12,000/month.
- SeniorComputer Engineer:above R$15,000/month.
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: The Inteli
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: TheComputer Engineeringcourse at Inteli is designed to train complete professionals with skills in computing, business and leadership, aligned with local and global demands. This means that, in addition to solid technical training, you will be prepared to lead multidisciplinary teams, undertake and transform society. Computer Engineering is not just a profession, it's a platform for building the future.
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn

content_blocks.text: Want to be part of this journey? Get to knowInteli's entrance examand find out how to start your career in today's most promising market.
content_blocks.section: Where a computer engineer works and how much they can earn
